data.text: @CBCNB No. Not acceptable. Stop this segregation. It's over. Let's move on please.

@Logetastic @madashellmama @CBCNB Dude.. gonna say it once. As soon as the vaxxed could spread it the idea and effectiveness of vaxx passports was blown all to crap. Got it? 
Does not take much intelligence to understand. It was just to get shots in arms and give sheep a sense of safety.

@HarveyGirl67 @CBCNB Decent humans like the ones who wanted and still want to to exclude a portion of Canadians based on a vaxx that did not stop spread or infection? That screamed consp. Theory at people who turned out to be right? Who kept kids from sports because they are unhealthy and scared?

@CBCNB It will be a short list. Can’t wait to get the list of businesses who keep the vaccination requirement and send it out on social media to make sure those that realize that vaccine passports do nothing because everyone can spread have the option not to shop there.

@Logetastic @ForeignObjects3 @madashellmama @CBCNB Or they got lumped in with Covid to keep sheeple living in fear.  Almost 20,000 people died from flu, pneumonia and other respiratory illnesses in 2019... Think about that with your 30,000 in 2 years

@CBCNB I hope that as we enter this phase, there will be temperance and patience and respect for different levels of comfort. Given the s$&show that is the rest of the world, wouldn't it be nice of we could do better in our little corner? We dont have to be the same to be decent humans.
@Rolie1979 @comeau_charles @SlimPickinguy @CBCNB @premierbhiggs Charlie, along with many will soon be protesters
